backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a team name update tied to the team.ts config file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text listing summaries for all frontend files including pages, components, config, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes with global border and body styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with root layout and routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/contact/BranchCo: Card component showing branch info with map embed, contact details, and call/WhatsApp actions.
frontend/src/components/home/EcoFriendly: Section highlighting eco-friendly pest control methods with icons and descriptive text plus an image.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedSer: Displays three featured services with cards and a button linking to the full services list.
Auto-rotating hero slider with images, titles, CTAs, and manual navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/home/OurTeamSect: Team display section rendering team members from the shared team configuration.
frontend/src/components/home/ServiceLoca: Displays a grid of service locations with images and icons for different property types.
frontend/src/components/home/WhyChooseUs: Renders a promotional section listing reasons to choose the service, with icons and an accompanying image.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Provides the site footer with company info, quick links, branch details, and social links.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Implements the site header with logo, navigation links, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps the site layout with a header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Shows a card for an individual service with image, description, and a link to its detail page.
frontend/src/config/services.ts: Defines the Service interface and a list of service configurations including descriptions and images.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Holds site-wide configuration such as name, social links, and branch contact details.
frontend/src/config/team.ts: Exports team member data including names, roles, and images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the static site.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark mode brand theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page with company information, stats, and sets the document title on mount.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information for all branches using configuration data and sets the document title.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage by composing multiple feature sections and sets the page title on mount.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetailPage.tsx: Shows details for a specific service based on slug, including benefits, process steps, and contact options.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesListPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all available services and sets the document title.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and brand theme extensions.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, known issues, and pending feature requests related to updating a team member name.
